org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input.InputManager

  • public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The InputManager class is used to manage input both on PC and on Android.

      A method used to check the input using the appropriate input manager
      static void create()
      A method used to create the input manager instances and setup to be ready for receiving input
